long_description: The REI Outdoor blanket will help keep you dry and comfortable on your next outdoor dining adventure. It's roomy enough for a 2-person picnic or an outdoor nap. Soft polyester fleece face provides a warm, comfortable surface; tough, 150-denier polyester oxford backing features polyurethane coating to resist dirt, wear and tear. Includes a stuff sack with carrying strap. Blanket is machine washable for easy care.
short_description: The REI Outdoor blanket will help keep you dry and comfortable on your next outdoor dining adventure. It's roomy enough for a 2-person picnic or an outdoor nap.
